attributes.action: stop raising the tax on petrol and diesel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The price of a litre of fuel has gone up by about 10pence,depending on where you live,over the last 12months or so.
Its about time the government stop and listerned to the public FOR ONCE.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
